name: FutureScanX
description: FutureScanX (FSX) is a cryptocurrency intelligence platform built for professional traders and institutions seeking real-time, actionable market insights. The platform aggregates data from over 300 analytical factors across multiple blockchains, providing users with whale activity tracking, AI-powered trading signals, news sentiment analysis, and derivatives market intelligence. FSX integrates data from sources including GeckoTerminal, Etherscan, BSCScan, Solscan, CoinGlass, and DeFiLlama to deliver verified blockchain transaction data with direct explorer links across 14+ supported chains. The platform also features The X Group, a trading community with crypto-native social features including token-gated access, XP progression systems, and peer-to-peer messaging capabilities.
